mapper.select: SELECT CASE o.device WHEN 6 THEN 'wap站' WHEN 5 THEN '官网' WHEN 2 THEN '安卓' WHEN 1 THEN 'IOS' ELSE '其他' END AS device, DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') create_time, COUNT(o.create_time) num FROM `order` o WHERE (o.`schedule` BETWEEN 1 AND 5) AND o.`status` = 1 AND(DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) GROUP BY o.device,DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY o.create_time,o.device

SELECT CASE o.device WHEN 6 THEN 'wap站' WHEN 5 THEN '官网' WHEN 2 THEN '安卓' WHEN 1 THEN 'IOS' ELSE '其他' END AS device, DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') create_time, COUNT(o.create_time) num FROM `order` o WHERE (o.`schedule` BETWEEN 1 AND 5) AND o.`status` = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m') =#{month} GROUP BY o.device,DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY o.create_time,o.device

SELECT CASE o.device WHEN 6 THEN 'wap站' WHEN 5 THEN '官网' WHEN 2 THEN '安卓' WHEN 1 THEN 'IOS' ELSE '其他' END AS device, DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m') create_time, COUNT(o.create_time) num FROM `order` o WHERE (o.`schedule` BETWEEN 1 AND 5) AND o.`status` = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y') =#{year} GROUP BY o.device,DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY o.create_time,o.device

SELECT og.title goodsTitle, COUNT(*) goodsNum FROM `order_goods` og LEFT JOIN `order` o ON og.order_id = o.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(og.create_time, '%Y') = #{year} AND (o.`schedule` BETWEEN 1 AND 5) AND o.`status` = 1 GROUP BY og.title ORDER BY goodsNum DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH(oo.address) > 6 THEN SUBSTR(oo.address, 5, 2) ELSE oo.address END AS city, count(*) countNum FROM order_other oo LEFT JOIN `order` o ON oo.order_id = o.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(oo.create_time, '%Y') = #{year} AND oo.address IS NOT NULL AND oo.address != '' AND (o.`schedule` BETWEEN 1 AND 5) AND o.`status` = 1 GROUP BY city ORDER BY countNum DESC LIMIT 10;
